page.title: 20TOURISM. NORTHLEACH,A CENTRE
page.content: Northleach is described as the heart of the Cotswolds. It is said to be an ideal centre for touring the area. There is varied accommodation in the main street in Inns and Hotels. A lively Chamber of Commerce has produced a brochure about the town with a map showing local footpaths. A resident has produced a well- researched history of Northleach and provided 2 walks with excellent comments on some of the buildings seen. A Calender of events is provided for 1985 and includes the following:- (1) A photographic exhibition of the Royal Family in Gloucestershire. (2) A production of Smike at the Grammar school.(3) A Charter Fair & Heritage Country Show.(4) Chairmaking at the Museum.(5) Visits by well-known choirs to the church.
